definition: rather than.../與其|与其[yu3 qi2] A 不如[bu4 ru2] B (rather than A, better to B)

sentences.english: This strain of popular discourse and feeling in China is more patriotic than nationalistic.
sentences.chinese: 这种感觉与其说是民族主义不如说是爱国心。

sentences.english: Instead, check out the company' s reputation through the industry grapevine.
sentences.chinese: 与其这样做，不如通过行业内线来了解该公司的声誉。

sentences.english: They also rue the inwardness of Japanese firms that resist co-operating with others.
sentences.chinese: 它们同样规范日本内部的公司来抵制与其公司的合作。

sentences.english: What is the International Environmental Treaty-making System and What are its Objectives?
sentences.chinese: 国际环境条约的制定系统与其目的为何？

sentences.english: The amount of solar energy hitting its high-latitude location is now roughly the same as it was when it shut down.
sentences.chinese: 如今到达高纬度地区的太阳能与其关闭时的大致相当。

sentences.english: Hypocrisy is also at play in how Bernanke and his Chinese counterparts are embroiled in a race to the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 伯南克与其中国对手的竞次之争不也是一种虚伪么。

sentences.english: Instead of looking at leaves as something to rake, think of them as potential fun.
sentences.chinese: 与其把树叶扫走扔掉，不如找找它潜在的乐趣。

sentences.english: Treat it gently by allowing your equity to grow steadily rather than in bursts.
sentences.chinese: 与其暴赢，不如缓进，稳扎稳打地积累资产。

sentences.english: Use element definitions with the same target namespace as their complex type definition.
sentences.chinese: 元素定义与其复杂类型定义使用同一个目标命名空间。

sentences.english: So Madan and colleagues gave cellphones to 70 students in an undergraduate dormitory.
sentences.chinese: 因此马丹与其同事给学校里70名学生发了手机。

sentences.english: Autopolyploids are genetically isolated from their parental diploids .
sentences.chinese: 同源多倍体与其亲本二倍体在遗传上相隔离。

sentences.english: Firstly, I have searched history of development of comics and their basic information.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我先找了许多有关漫画的发展史与其基本资料。

sentences.english: Are any of these lesions associated with his diabetes insipidus?
sentences.chinese: 这些病损是否与其尿崩症有关？

sentences.english: At last, it point out the correlation between the Kripke"semantics and his reference theory."
sentences.chinese: 最后指出了克里普克语义学与其指称理论的关联。

sentences.english: The antibacterial ability of chitosan to E. coli was related to the protonation of amino group.
sentences.chinese: 壳聚糖对大肠杆菌的抑菌作用与其氨基的质子化有关。

sentences.english: No respectable citizen in town had anything to do with Mad Henry
sentences.chinese: 市镇里没有哪个正派人与其有任何来往。

definition: not equal to/not as good as/inferior to/it would be better to
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
heel/to follow closely/to go with/(of a woman) to marry sb/with/compared with/to/towards/and (joining two nouns)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
